author: Editor
title: Spellweaver
text:

Hurry up and win one of the 5000 license keys Complete the tasks to get as many entries as possible. Your chances of winning increase with each entry! This offer is available for several days only. Join & Win Terms and conditions 
Unlock a special feature in Spellweaver game! Win "Wrath of Shamans 2.0" card deck worth $20 for FREE! 5000 keys are waiting for the owners! Spellweaver is a free-to-play digital card game true to the classics of the genre, adding in several unique features for a new and fresh gameplay experience. With a focus of strategic depth and variety, it offers endless hours of fun in casual or AI matches, ranked play, drafts, and tournaments!   
Windows XP/ 7/ 8/ 10; Memory: 1 GB RAM; Graphics: Any 256MB DirectX 9.0c compatible video card; DirectX: Version 9.0c; Storage: 500 MB available space Publisher:
